snippet: A spokesman for the New School, which still pays Bob Kerrey, its former president, $602,000 a year, said the school only recently learned that he was taking on an additional job.
abstract: Bob Kerrey, former president of Manhattan's New School who is still on the school's payroll, announces plans to become executive chairman of the Minerva Project's Institute for Research and Scholarship.
lead_paragraph: A spokesman for the New School, which still pays Bob Kerrey, its former president, $602,000 a year, said the school only recently learned that he was taking on an additional job.

headline.seo: Bob Kerrey Adds Another Job, in a Surprise to New School
headline.main: New Position for Kerrey Is a Surprise
headline.print_headline: New Position For Kerrey Is a Surprise
